fact_check_explanation_title: The government plans to monitor potential adverse reactions to a Covid-19 vaccine, but that doesn’t mean it won’t be safe
fact_check_explanation_summary: The government needs a system for logging any medical problems that people encounter at the same time as the vaccine.

fact_check_explanation_title: The number of deaths from flu and pneumonia is about what you would expect this year
fact_check_explanation_summary: Although there are fewer of these deaths than usual, the fall is neither unexpected, nor extreme

fact_check_explanation_title: A picture of the Titanic sinking is not a newly discovered photograph
fact_check_explanation_summary: It’s a painting from 1996, by an artist who worked on the film.

fact_check_explanation_title: It’s too early to say how many suicides have happened during the pandemic
fact_check_explanation_summary: A post on social media claims without evidence that suicide deaths have been higher than coronavirus deaths in the last two months.

fact_check_explanation_title: Baseless claims about vaccine safety go viral on Facebook
fact_check_explanation_summary: The post claims that the Covid-19 death rate is much lower than the estimated 0.5%-1% and makes baseless claims that a vaccine would kill more people than the virus.

fact_check_explanation_title: Martin Lewis and City of London Police have not warned about a scam involving banks and mobile networks
fact_check_explanation_summary: This claim has been circulating since at least March 2020.

fact_check_explanation_title: It’s misleading to compare the effectiveness of Covid-19 vaccines and the death rate
This post does not show photo of a giant eagle in Scotland
fact_check_explanation_summary: The photo appears to have originally been taken in South Carolina.

fact_check_explanation_title: The number of people dying right now is not the same as in any other year
fact_check_explanation_summary: It was also claimed on talkRADIO that deaths from other respiratory diseases have simply been “replaced“ with Covid-19.

fact_check_explanation_title: The infection fatality rate for Covid-19 is higher than 0.1%
fact_check_explanation_summary: Toby Young missed that a study he was citing had already calculated an IFR for Covid.

fact_check_explanation_title: The figure for a dose of a potential Covid-19 vaccine covers the cost of delivering the treatment
fact_check_explanation_summary: GP practices are private companies that receive funding from a range of places.

fact_check_explanation_title: Ticketmaster won’t demand proof of a Covid-19 vaccine for concert entry
fact_check_explanation_summary: The company said decisions about entry requirements for events will be up to individual organisers
